about_the_game: Immerse yourself in violence, chaos, and a bit of romance with Big Buck Backshot’s adrenaline-pumping soundtrack! From electrifying electronic beats to hard-hitting heavy metal tracks, this album perfectly captures the thrill of being a deer desperate for love, stopping at nothing to find their mate. Music composed and produced by Lilac Rust. Download includes all tracks in .mp3 and high-quality .wav formats.
detailed_description: Immerse yourself in violence, chaos, and a bit of romance with Big Buck Backshot’s adrenaline-pumping soundtrack! From electrifying electronic beats to hard-hitting heavy metal tracks, this album perfectly captures the thrill of being a deer desperate for love, stopping at nothing to find their mate. Music composed and produced by Lilac Rust. Download includes all tracks in .mp3 and high-quality .wav formats.
name: Big Buck Backshots Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 320 MB available space

short_description: The serenity of the woodlands is blown apart by a young buck's desperation for love, stopping at nothing to fortify his bloodline and legacy.
